name: Portal 2 Community Puzzle File
summary: A P2C file contains a community, or co-operative, puzzle used by Portal 2, a first-person puzzle solving game. It stores the definition of puzzle in a voxel X Y Z (X is right, Y is forward, Z is up) format where each voxel represents a 1 x 1 x 1 panel area in the puzzle. P2C files also contain metadata about the puzzle, which includes the title, description, creation time, and version.
